readable.title: 3148571800_c5515e6c3d
readable.content: A man holds a stick while a stream of fire erupts from the end of it . A man is playing with fire in front of a group of people . A man sets off a large sparkler while the crown watches on . A man with a firecracker with a crowd of people behind him watching . fireworks light up a nighttime street , while the crowd stands back
